attributes.action: Make Council tax related to ability to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council Tax should be the same per head throughout the country. Property should not be in the calculation. There should be legislated limits to the items Councils can spend money on. Coucillors should have business experience, they are running a multimillion pound organisation. This tax not to be misconstued as a Pol Tax. There should be a legislated maximum percentage of tax so as not to cause a burden.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
